description.zh-cn: 位于波罗的海东岸的欧洲东北部国家，是波罗的海国家之一。现为欧盟和北约成员国。
description.en: A country in Northeastern Europe on the eastern shore of the Baltic Sea, one of the Baltic states. Currently a member of the EU and NATO.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚政治人物，现任拉脱维亚总统。
description.en: Latvian politician, the current President of Latvia.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚共和国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The position of the head of state of the Republic of Latvia.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚政治人物，现任拉脱维亚总理。
description.en: Latvian politician, the current Prime Minister of Latvia.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚共和国的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The position of the head of government of the Republic of Latvia.

description.zh-cn: 18世纪至20世纪初统治拉脱维亚地区的前国家实体。
description.en: A former state entity that ruled the territory of Latvia from the 18th to the early 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间及之后吞并和控制拉脱维亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state that annexed and controlled Latvia during and after World War II.

description.zh-cn: 导致拉脱维亚于1991年8月21日正式恢复独立的公民投票事件。
description.en: A referendum event that led to the formal restoration of Latvia's independence on August 21, 1991.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲的政治和经济联盟，拉脱维亚于2004年加入。
description.en: A political and economic union in Europe, which Latvia joined in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 一个旨在集体防御的政府间军事联盟，拉脱维亚于2004年加入。
description.en: An intergovernmental military alliance for collective defense, which Latvia joined in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 13世纪初通过武力征服拉脱维亚地区并强迫当地居民改信基督教的德意志十字军组织。
description.en: A German crusading order that conquered the territory of Latvia in the early 13th century and forced the local population to convert to Christianity.

description.zh-cn: 13世纪由德意志十字军在现今拉脱维亚和爱沙尼亚地区建立的十字军国家。
description.en: A crusader state established by the Teutonic Knights in the 13th century in the territory of modern-day Latvia and Estonia.

description.zh-cn: 全球性战争，在此期间拉脱维亚先后被苏联和纳粹德国占领。
description.en: A global war during which Latvia was occupied successively by the Soviet Union and Nazi Germany.

nodes.id: 拉脱维亚苏维埃社会主义共和国

zh-cn: 拉脱维亚苏维埃社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚被苏联吞并后成立的加盟共和国。
description.en: The constituent republic established after Latvia was annexed by the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间曾占领拉脱维亚的德国政权。
description.en: The German regime that occupied Latvia during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国在波罗的海国家和白俄罗斯部分地区建立的占领区行政单位。
description.en: The civilian occupation regime established by Nazi Germany in the Baltic states and parts of Belarus.

description.zh-cn: 促进波罗的海国家（包括拉脱维亚）从苏联独立的非暴力运动。
description.en: A non-violent movement that led to the restoration of independence for the Baltic states, including Latvia, from the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚共和国的立法机构。
description.en: The legislative body of the Republic of Latvia.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚政治人物，曾任拉脱维亚总统。
description.en: Latvian politician who served as the President of Latvia.

description.zh-cn: 曾于1936-1940年及1992-1994年与拉脱维亚建立外交关系。
description.en: Established diplomatic relations with Latvia during 1936-1940 and 1992-1994.

description.zh-cn: 自1991年起与拉脱维亚建立外交关系。
description.en: Established diplomatic relations with Latvia since 1991.

description.zh-cn: 苏联的主要继承国，与拉脱维亚关系紧张。
description.en: The primary successor state to the Soviet Union, with strained relations with Latvia.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚在军事安全上所依赖的国家之一。
description.en: One of the countries on which Latvia relies for military security.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚独立后产生的一种特殊的法律地位，主要适用于苏联时期移居的非拉脱维亚族人及其后代。
description.en: A unique legal status in Latvia that emerged after its independence, primarily applying to non-ethnic Latvians who migrated during the Soviet era and their descendants.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚政治人物，曾任拉脱维亚总统，签署法令停止给予新生儿非公民身份。
description.en: Latvian politician who served as President of Latvia and signed a law to stop granting non-citizen status to newborns.

description.zh-cn: 埃德加斯·林克维奇斯是拉脱维亚的现任总统。
description.en: Edgars Rinkēvičs is the current President of Latvia.

description.zh-cn: 埃维卡·西利尼亚是拉脱维亚的现任总理。
description.en: Evika Siliņa is the current Prime Minister of Latvia.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚于1918年11月18日宣布从俄罗斯帝国独立。
description.en: Latvia declared independence from the Russian Empire on November 18, 1918.

description.zh-cn: 1991年的独立公投推动了拉脱维亚在同年8月21日正式恢复独立。
description.en: The 1991 independence referendum pushed Latvia to formally restore its independence on August 21 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚于1991年8月21日恢复独立，脱离苏联。
description.en: Latvia restored its independence on August 21, 1991, seceding from the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚于2004年加入欧洲联盟。
description.en: Latvia joined the European Union in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚于2004年加入北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Latvia joined NATO in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 在13世纪早期，条顿骑士团通过武力征服了现今拉脱维亚的大部分地区。
description.en: In the early 13th century, the Teutonic Order conquered most of the territory of present-day Latvia by force.

description.zh-cn: 条顿骑士团在被征服的拉脱维亚和爱沙尼亚南部地区建立了十字军国家玛利亚地（立窝尼亚）。
description.en: The Teutonic Order founded the crusader state of Terra Mariana (Livonia) in the conquered territories of Latvia and southern Estonia.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间，苏联吞并拉脱维亚，直至其1991年恢复独立。
description.en: During World War II, the Soviet Union annexed Latvia, a control that lasted until its restoration of independence in 1991.

relationships.target: 拉脱维亚苏维埃社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 苏联吞并拉脱维亚后，建立了拉脱维亚苏维埃社会主义共和国作为其加盟共和国。
description.en: After annexing Latvia, the Soviet Union established the Latvian Soviet Socialist Republic as its constituent republic.

relationships.source: 拉脱维亚苏维埃社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚苏维埃社会主义共和国是苏联的一个加盟共和国。
description.en: The Latvian Soviet Socialist Republic was a constituent republic of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1941年6月苏德战争爆发后，纳粹德国占领了原属苏联控制的拉脱维亚，直到1944年苏联反攻。
description.en: After the outbreak of the German-Soviet War in June 1941, Nazi Germany occupied Latvia, which was previously under Soviet control, until the Soviet counter-offensive in 1944.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国占领波罗的海国家后，建立了奥斯兰总督辖区进行管治。
description.en: After occupying the Baltic states, Nazi Germany established the Reichskommissariat Ostland to administer the territory.

description.zh-cn: 歌唱革命作为波罗的海独立运动的一部分，促进了拉脱维亚的最终独立。
description.en: The Singing Revolution, as part of the Baltic independence movement, contributed to the eventual independence of Latvia.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚议会于2007年5月31日选举瓦尔季斯·扎特莱尔斯为总统。
description.en: The Saeima elected Valdis Zatlers as President on May 31, 2007.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国与拉脱维亚在1936-1940年间有公使级外交关系，在1992-1994年间有总领事关系。
description.en: The Republic of China had minister-level diplomatic relations with Latvia from 1936-1940 and consular-general relations from 1992-1994.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与拉脱维亚自1991年起建立外交关系。
description.en: The People's Republic of China and Latvia have maintained diplomatic relations since 1991.

description.zh-cn: 因苏联历史问题，拉脱维亚对俄罗斯抱持反感态度，并配合欧盟对其实施经济制裁。
description.en: Due to historical issues with the Soviet Union, Latvia holds negative sentiment towards Russia and cooperates with the EU in imposing economic sanctions against it.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚在军事安全上依赖北大西洋公约组织。
description.en: Latvia relies on NATO for its military security.

description.zh-cn: 拉脱维亚在军事安全上依赖美国。
description.en: Latvia relies on the United States for its military security.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统莱伊蒙茨·维尤尼斯签署法令，规定自2020年1月1日起，在拉脱维亚出生的非公民子女自动获得公民身份，从而停止了新生儿被赋予非公民身份的做法。
description.en: Then-President Raimonds Vējonis signed a law stipulating that from January 1, 2020, children of non-citizens born in Latvia would automatically receive citizenship, thus ending the practice of granting non-citizen status to newborns.
